name: 房同經
objective:
人的身體一旦接觸自然環境，便開始運作各個器官的功能。然而，與機器不同，人體無法任意更換零件。一旦身體機能出現問題，許多人常因缺乏相關知識，無法正確應對，甚至對早期徵兆渾然不覺。因此，本課程的主要目的是透過基礎醫學知識的介紹，幫助大學生了解自身身體構造與運作原理，培養自我健康管理的能力，能及早發現異常並主動應對。我們希望培養的是身心健全、具備健康素養的大學生，而非僅知埋首書本、卻忽視自身健康的學生。
Once the human body comes into contact with the natural environment, all of its organs begin to function. Unlike machines, however, the human body cannot simply replace its parts when problems arise. When physical functions begin to decline or show signs of abnormality, many people lack the knowledge to respond appropriately—or worse, fail to recognize the warning signs altogether.
The primary goal of this course is to provide students with a foundational understanding of medical science, enabling them to better understand how their bodies work. By doing so, they can monitor their own health, detect abnormalities early, and take proactive steps to maintain their well-being. Our aim is to cultivate well-rounded, healthy university students—not those who excel only academically while neglecting their physical health.
